description.@en: Some laugh at me for claiming such, but due to a life spent working the land, I have an uncanny sense of the weather.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You can accurately predict the weather without having to make a Skill Test. In addition, you do not suffer from the effects of Rough Terrain in combat or while traveling.
